name: Bob's Quest (AlexRos)
description:
Controls:

  1. A or Left Arrow - Move to Left
  2. D or Right Arrow - Move to Right
  3. W or Up Arrow - Jump
  4. Esc - Exit Game

Made using Unity

The game is an Alpha/Demo, it’s unfinished, it’s still under development and many things can change.

This is an Update, it's the version 0.2

The assets are from  Pixel Adventure

We are interested in change the Sprite Player, if wanna help please send us a email to rosarlanzon5@gmail.com
